item.title: User Experience for Tools Development
item.description: Recently I learn a book about “Designing the User Experience of Game Development Tools”, the book is pretty straight forward and easy to understand. As a tools programmer this is a book that I must read, in order to make my tools better. What is User Experience? There are many definition about user experience, but from the I read. The populer one is from Elizabeth Sanders, Tools need to be, “Useful, Usable and Desireable”
